section.title: SbbLocalObject Extension
section.para: This extension to JAIN SLEE 1.1 introduces org.mobicents.slee.SbbLocalObjectExt interface, which extends javax.slee.SbbLocalObject with methods to retreive the parent Sbb Entity, if any, and to retreive also information such as the child name, and the parent child relation name too.

listitem.para: Retrieves the name of the child relation used to create this object. This method is a mandatory transactional method.
Retrieves the name of this object. This method is a mandatory transactional method.
Retrieves the parent Sbb object. This method is a mandatory transactional method.
